jumbotron_home_header_content:
Hallo, my name is Anna Cloud
and I will change the world of Fashion!
I introduce you my friend Configo, the first 3D bag configurator!
Try Configo!

and I will change the world of Fashion!

Try Configo!
titolo_area_shop: Anna Cloud has a big dream : to change the world of Fashion.
sottotitolo_area_shop: I need you. Ah, I was forgetting, I’m not a charlatan!
testo_area_shop: We don’t follow trends imposed by the fashion world. We realize only personalized bags on demand with eco-friendly leather. Our philosophy is called Slow Fashion: we believe in the digital and ecological revolution of Configo!
testo_5: We want to solve the problem of surplus in production with the use of the 3D configurator for an approach more aware of the sustainable Fashion: a bag at the time, zero waste and creativity at its must!
testo_6: A new approach also for the Shop section: Only Limited Edition. Unique Bags, selected by your Anna, but still always on Demand!
testo_4:
Our Collection

The collection is inspired by geometric shapes that recall a return to simplicity and durability.
With our creations we want to break the Status Quo and bring to our customers a continuous, essential, functional and customizable product. To have our bag you need time and time has a value! All you need is Slow!
jumbotron_configuratore_content:
To respect the environment we realize one bag at the time, without wastage.
Create your own bag in eco-friendly leather!
Squeeze Configo!
jumbotron_configuratore_content_mobile:
To respect the environment we realize one bag at the time, without wastage.
Create your own bag in eco-friendly leather!
Squeeze Configo!
testo_area_configuratore: I don’t want to reveal immediately the reason just trust us: we source and adopt leather with the highest quality and environmental certifications on the market!
titolo_preconfigurate: Relax and let yourself be inspired by Configo!
testo_post_preconfigurate:
Little Clouds! By now you have understood, we live in a verySlow world. If I intrigued you and you think I’m likeable you can find the replies to all your questions on our Blog!

Do not forget however that we are a small brand. To change the world we need your help: give us feedbacks, comments, constructive criticism and advices. We know that we have to grow and improve ourselves: we are longing to do so.

Stop talking, help us right now!
testo_7_titolo: People and time have a value.
testo_7:
Step into the world of Anna Cloud.
Help us to change things!
presentazione:
Here is Configo! Our 3D configurator friend

Choose a model and personalise your bag
sostenibile:
Anna Cloud is sustainable!

All bags are made with leather that boost the highest quality environmental certifications on the market. We are committed to avoid any kind of production waste and unsold: for this reasons our Tuscan artisans realize one bag at the time. So, friends of mine, to have an Anna Cloud’s bag you will have to wait for 7 working days: the shortest possible time to have the maximum respect and care for you and the environment. I promise you however that the bag we will send you won’t be an ordinary bag: it will be a unique piece! That won’t be the best one in the world but the unique bag of value in your wardrobe! Wow!
dettagli_prezzo:
22% VAT inc.
free shipping
delivery in 7 working days
dettagli_prezzo_mobile: 22% VAT inc. free shipping delivery in 7 working days
accedi_salvare:
Login
to save
blocco_1:
We do not follow the usual imposed trends and high prices. We don’t follow the same perfect beauty ideals of the “thin models”, we aren’t looking for the ostentation and forced beauty.

Do not think that these words are catchphrases!

We little Clouds are ordinary people, with virtues and defects, whether physical or behavioral. We are, above all, true people, not easily influenced, innovative and careful to environmental issues. These are the ideals of our Community!

to find out more...

Fly on our Blog
blocco_2:
Let’s think it over carefully. By using the 3D configurator, we solve a great deal of environmental problems of the Fashion world. By producing only on demand we slow to zero the unsold, reduce the production waste, the consumption of water and energy.

Each bag is produced only for you, without waste and using real ecological made in Italy leather certified for the environmental quality.

personalize now your bag
blocco_3:
And now we talk about our Team.

Our Team is made up of myself, Anna Cloud, your digital darling! Who sometimes happens to make jokes even though they come out not so funny! Then, we have Confido, our 3D configurator, which enable to personalize each model. It has one defect only: it’s a bit Slow, but it is anyway Fashion!And lastly our Chat for the Customer Care!

We are a digital team at the service of a people Team who work hard to make sure you don’tmiss anything!
shop_titolo_preconfigurate: Relax and let yourself be inspired by Configo!
shop_sottotitolo_preconfigurate: If you prefer to personalize it here are some suggestions by Configo:
shop_scheda_descrizione:
Our bags are made with circular economy products. The soft quality leather we use is tanned in a green and sustainable way. The result is a fashionable, trendy product, carefully made by our Tuscan craftsmen and respectful of the environment. Wonderful!

Our philosophy marries innovation, tradition and eco-sustainability in every accessory.
shop_scheda_dati_piccola:
INFO

A practical bucket made with soft leather.

  • lined with durable cotton.
  • offers a convenient pocket with zip closure.
  • closure of the bucket decorated with hot stamp.
  • adjustable shoulder strap that allows you to wear it on the shoulder or across the body.
  • the color scheme preferred by our creative team.
Composition:Leather
Metal accessories:Nickel color
Height:22cm
Diameter:16.5cm

Made in Italy
